articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on the occasion of the New Year Juche 106 (2017).
					 The floral basket was handed over to Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho by Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets and Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Baskets and Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the New Year Juche 106 (2017).
					 They were handed over to Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK who is doyen of the corps, Wednesday.
					
					 A floral basket and a congratulatory letter were also sent to Kim Jong Un by Sameh Lotfi Abdelhady, Egyptian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials on the occasions of the fifth anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the New Year.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The respected Marshal Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of his assumption of the post as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					 The floral basket and letter were handed over to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Roman O. Jimenez Ortega, military attache of the Cuban embassy who is doyen of the corps, Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 4th meeting of activists in fisheries under the Korean People's Army laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces Wednesday. 
					 They paid tribute to the great leaders, reporting by heart that "spectacular scenery of a good catch of fish" was provided this year, too, thanks to the energetic leadership of the Party.

articles.title: UN Missions Here Lay Floral Baskets at Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
UN Missions Here Lay Floral Baskets at Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Members of missions of the UNDP, UN Population Fund and the UN Children's Fund here laid floral baskets at the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill here Wednesday on the occasion of the New Year Juche 106 (2017).
					 They put the floral baskets before the statues and paid tribute.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership Celebrated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership Celebrated
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Youth and students and women's union officials and members met at the Central Youth Hall and the Hall of Women Wednesday to celebrate the fifth anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. 
					 Present there were officials concerned, officials of the youth league and the women's union, youth and students and women's union members.
					
					 Reports and speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 The reporters and speakers said that Kim Jong Un set it as the supreme programme of army building to model the entire army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and had worked heart and soul strengthen the KPA into the invincible army devotedly defending the leader and the party.
					
					 They noted that under his leadership, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have developed into an invincible revolutionary Paektusan army which is possessed of the ever-victorious Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il strategy and tactics, heroic fighting spirit and perfect actual war capacity and which is fully ready to reliably defend the security of the country and the people's happiness.
					
					 They stressed that Kim Jong Un wisely led the KPA to stand in the van of struggle for the prosperity of the country and the people's happiness and thus bring about the golden days in construction and a new history of great fish hauls and work miracles on the front of the recovery campaign in the flood-hit areas of North Hamgyong Province. 
					
					 They vowed to carry forward to completion the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of the Songun revolution started in Mt. Paektu, with the might of the army-people great unity, rallied closer around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Ministry of People's Armed Forces Arranges Film Show for Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Ministry of People's Armed Forces Arranges Film Show for Military Attaches Corps
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces arranged a film show for the military attaches here Wednesday on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The participants watched a Korean documentary "Leading People's Army to Be Creator of People's Happiness", which deals with the exploits of Kim Jong Un who put forward the People's Army not only as guardian of destiny of the country and the people but as a pace-setter in the general advance for building a powerful socialist country.

articles.title: Endless Stream of Service Personnel, People Visit Sinchon Museum
articles.content:
Endless Stream of Service Personnel, People Visit Sinchon Museum
Sinchon, December 28 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of service personnel, people from all walks of life, youth and students, overseas Koreans and foreigners visit the Sinchon Museum which bears witness to the barbarism of the U.S. imperialists and class enemies.
					 This year alone, the museum drew hundreds of thousands of visitors.
					
					 The museum bears witness to the aggressive nature, brutality and cruelty of the U.S. imperialists whose aggression of Korea started more than a century ago.
					
					 U.S. imperialist aggressor troops massacred more than 35 000 patriots and other people or a quarter of the then population of Sinchon County by the most brutal method in less than two months of their occupation of it in the period of the strategic temporary retreat of the Korean People's Army during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Displayed at the museum are photos and evidence disclosing the monstrous crimes of the U.S. imperialists and class enemies.
					
					 At the meetings to vow to settle accounts with the enemies, visitors declared that they would never forget the crimes committed by the enemies, adding: Should they ignite another war, we will sweep the human butchers off the surface of the earth in order to give vent to the pent-up grudge and take revenge upon those cruelly killed in Sinchon.

articles.title: Successes Made in Education in 2016
articles.content:
Successes Made in Education in 2016
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- A solid springboard has been provided for building a power of talents in the DPRK this year through radical improvement in education in the new century.
					 Great progress has been made in the drive for improving educational contents, creating the advantageous educational methods and generalizing it in the fields of higher education and general education, throughout the country.
					
					 More than 110 universities and middle and primary schools put some 640 000 teaching programs on a pragmatic, integrated and modern basis and made more than 750 000 e-teaching programs.
					
					 Kim Il Sung University made curriculums on a high level by putting stress on training more academic and practical talents and fundamentally improved educational contents and methods.
					
					 At least 8 000 educational methods, including the listening and conversation test method of foreign languages by use of computer, were created. At least 70 teaching methods were generalized.
					
					 A big stride has been made in the work for improving the educational condition and environment.
					
					 All the classrooms of nearly 10 universities, including Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, turned into multi-functional ones of high grade. The number of the multi-functional classrooms was put at over 23 000.
					
					 Universities across the country manufactured more than ten thousand apparatuses for experiment and practice and the factory universities laid material and technical foundations for improving experiment and practice education.
					
					 The appearance of more than one hundred senior middle schools provided a sure guarantee for satisfactorily training technical talents.
					
					 Emulation for increasing study zeal was dynamically waged among students.
					
					 There took place the national software contest of university students, national symposium of different sectors and national exhibition of inventions of university students. The DPRK students won the Codechef Internet program contest and the 40th ICPC (International College Programming Contest).
					
					 Printing houses and publishing companies and units producing educational apparatuses produced a lot of educational supplies in time.
					
					 In particular, they sent hundreds of thousands of textbooks, reference books, experimental apparatuses and reagents of several thousand kinds to the students of the flood-hit northern parts of North Hamgyong Province.
					
					 Successes were also made in realizing the integration of education, scientific research and production.
					
					 More than 20 universities, including Kim Il Sung University, developed over 190 latest technical goods and realized their local production, thus making a great contribution to economic construction of the country and the improvement of people's living standard.
					
					 This year eloquently showed that the DPRK can demonstrate its might as a country of education, a power of talents in the near future.

articles.title: Signal Successes Made in Int'l Football Circles in 2016
articles.content:
Signal Successes Made in Int'l Football Circles in 2016
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The DPRK won the two women's world cups this year.
					 The DPRK women's football team took the first place in the 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup in October and at the 2016 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup held in Papua New Guinea.
					
					 In an article titled "DPRK women's football team won world cups in succession", the Chinese Tengxun said that the DPRK team has many talented footballers as it attained two women's world cups in succession in a short span of time.
					
					 The Chinese Souhu also noted that the future of the DPRK women's football is bright and this means that the DPRK makes great progress.
					
					 Another Chinese Baidu carried an article titled "DPRK women's football team won two world cups for 42 days" while the AFC in an article posted on its website said that the DPRK women's football team displayed the honor of Asia.

articles.title: Performances of Youth League and Trade Union Art Squads
articles.content:
Performances of Youth League and Trade Union Art Squads
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the C.C., Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League and the workers' art group of the C.C., General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) gave their performances at the Central Youth Hall and the Central Hall of Workers on Wednesday to celebrate the 5th anniversary of Marshal    Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Among the audience were officials concerned, youth league and trade union officials, youth and students, workers and trade union members.
					
					 The numbers of the performances included chorus "Ode to General   Kim Jong Un", poem and chorus "Revolutionary Armed Forces Uphold Leadership of Marshal Only" and trumpet and song "Soldiers Live Near the General".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the fact that the tradition of the Paektusan army has been successfully carried forward and the rosy future of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea is reliably guaranteed thanks to Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 There were also numbers reflecting the revolutionary zeal of the passionate youths to create new legendary tales about the heroic youth in the ongoing general advance and the workers and trade union members' faith and will to build a powerful socialist country without fail.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
Chongjin, December 28 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen met at Chongjin Port on Wednesday to celebrate the 5th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting attended by the captain and crewmen of a Mongolian-flagged ship.
					
					 Speakers referred to the fact that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un turned the DPRK into a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and the strongest military power in a short period of history to defend the country's dignity and sovereignty from every challenge of the imperialist aggression forces and their followers.
					
					 They extended invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle for building a powerful socialist country while demonstrating its might as a military power under Kim Jong Un's ever-victorious Songun leadership and making a dynamic advance for world peace.
					
					 Saying that the DPRK is sure to triumph, they stressed that the world would see the true picture of the DPRK thriving under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Anti-DPRK, Anti-Chongryon Moves under Fire
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Anti-DPRK, Anti-Chongryon Moves under Fire
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Japan made a decision to suspend subsidies to five Korean schools in Kanagawa Prefecture under the pretext that these schools have regular touch with the DPRK and history textbooks at those schools do not reflect what is demanded by the authorities.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says: 
					
					 If the Japanese authorities have a shred of conscience, they should guarantee Korean students the right to national education and conditions for learning in the light of reflecting on their past wrongdoings and from a humanitarian standpoint, adding this is due obligation of Japan and its state responsibility.
					
					 The Japanese authorities are finding fault with the contents of education at Korean schools operated by the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) but this does not make sense.
					
					 They leave education at other foreign schools as it is but are taking issue with history education at Korean schools only and pressurizing them to make correction. They are unreasonably insisting they cannot provide subsidies to Korean schools only.
					
					 This is the manifestation of double standards and national discrimination.
					
					 Lurking behind this is a black-hearted intention to inflict heavy financial burden on Koreans in Japan in a bid to cause psychological change and thus take them away from the fold of the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					 This is hideous human rights abuses and politically-motivated scheme which can be done only by the Japanese reactionaries who are steeped in inveterate and deep-seated hostility toward Chongryon and the DPRK.
					
					 Japan is seriously mistaken, however.
					
					 It would be well advised to ponder over the serious consequences to be entailed by the eruption of the pent-up resentment.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Socialism Centered on Popular Masses
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Socialism Centered on Popular Masses
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Korean-style socialism based on the Juche outlook and philosophy on the people is the best as it puts the dignity and position of the popular masses on the highest level, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Korean socialism is the most advanced society where the popular masses are the master of everything.
					
					 Our Party and state regard it as the most important affair and duty to take deep care of the people's political integrity and material and cultural life in a responsible manner.
					
					 Our Party has considered the popular masses as an independent driving force of the revolution, supporter, adviser and helper and led the socialist cause to victory, believing in them as in Heaven.
					
					 Our Party and state show the deepest love for the people to help them become the powerful beings with a high level of independent consciousness and creative ability and make all material wealth contribute to promoting the people's well-being. This is an inviolable principle.
					
					 For our Party and state, the people's wishes and interests are the absolute standards for all affairs and to serve them and make everything popular are considered as the most just and the top priority.
					
					 Making selfless, devoted efforts for the people is the key to getting socialism deeply rooted in the people's mind as life and soul and herein lie the solidity and vitality of the indestructible Korean-style socialist system. 
					
					 Socialism which the army and people of the DPRK value as the cradle of genuine life and happiness is crystal of the great leaders' idea of believing in the people as in Heaven which they regarded as maxim and faith all their lives and their ardent love and dedication to them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Park Geun Hye for Being Keen on Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorship
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Park Geun Hye for Being Keen on Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorship
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Decades have passed since the bloody "yusin" dictatorial rule by traitor Park Chung-Hee dropped its curtain in south Korea.
					 An article of Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says that the whole period of "yusin" tyrannical rule marked history of treachery in which Park challenged the desire of the nation and the demand of the times, and the days when he inflicted untold disaster and misfortune on the south Koreans.
					
					 Tragedy is that the south Koreans have faced specter of "yusin" dictator hovering around in society at present. The unprecedented breakdown and chaos of south Korea and crisis it has faced internally and externally are an inevitable product of the policy pursued by Park Geun Hye to revive the "yusin" dictatorship with the backing of outsiders, clean indifferent to the desire and wishes of the people, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Traitor Park, daughter of the "yusin" dictator, has desperately pursued sycophancy and treachery, confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and fascist crackdown, enforcing the harsh rule the way her father did.
					
					 She overturned all the agreements common to the nation just as the "yusin" dictator did and pushed the north-south relations into the worst catastrophe in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 She is a die-hard fascist as she has resorted to unpopular rule while enforcing "yusin" dictatorship. It is clear that nothing but only hideous political scandal can be committed by Park as she has resorted to fascist tyranny based on high-handed and arbitrary practices while mocking at the people.
					
					 The candlelight actions now being staged by the angry people across south Korea are an expression of their strong will never to pardon Park Geun Hye who has trampled down the elementary gains of democracy won at the cost of their blood and dampened their desire for national reunification by reviving the thrice-cursed "yusin" dictatorship in collusion with foreign forces.

articles.title: No Force on Earth Can Overpower Strength of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No Force on Earth Can Overpower Strength of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has made its winning streaks in the showdown with the U.S. which challenged the cause of global independence while styling itself an emperor in the world this year, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 It goes on: 
					
					 The DPRK dealt a telling blow at the U.S. engrossed in nuclear threat and blackmail against it through its H-bomb test and demonstrated to the world the dignity and spirit of Songun Korea.
					
					 The DPRK is capable of putting the U.S. mainland and any cesspool of evils on earth within the range of its strikes and reducing them to ashes by tipping new-type inter-continental ballistic rockets with more powerful nuclear warheads. 
					
					 The U.S. took more provocative attitude, not seriously heeding the advice of the DPRK that the road of escaping a miserable fate is to exercise self-control and self-restraint.
					
					 The DPRK took an immediate countermeasure for ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world in view of the grave situation.
					
					 The surface to surface medium- and long-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10 of Juche Korea was successfully fired into the sky.
					
					 The test-fire of SLBM was conducted to prove that the DPRK is the military power possessed of strong nuclear attack capability and the U.S. mainland and the Pacific operational theater are within the range of strikes of the DPRK.
					
					 The scientists and technicians of the Institute of Nuclear Weapons of the DPRK conducted the nuclear explosion test for judging the power of the newly studied and manufactured nuclear warhead in September.
					
					 The world was stunned by the eye-opening event in which the DPRK passed through the final gate for completing the nuclear force after having everything in place. 
					
					 The DPRK's strategic position has reached its highest level.
					
					 No force on earth can block the DPRK's advance. Neither sanctions nor blockade nor military pressure can ever frighten it.

articles.title: Poor Anti-Epidemic Policy of S. Korean Authorities Blamed
articles.content:
Poor Anti-Epidemic Policy of S. Korean Authorities Blamed
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Bird flu sweeping across south Korea now is due to poor anti-epidemic policy of the puppet authorities, said Yonhap TV News of south Korea on Dec. 23.
					 The bird flu broke out in the western area of south Korea in succession from November, causing a big chaos on poultry farms.
					
					 Entering December its damage spread to the eastern area, threatening the whole of south Korea.
					
					 The reason was proved to be the use of disinfectant which is either ineffective or whose efficacy was not verified.
					
					 The Ministry of Agro-Forestry, Livestock and Foodstuff has not made this fact known to the public, making it impossible to take any measure, though belatedly. 
					
					 A lawmaker from an opposition party, revealing this fact, blamed the serious loophole of the "government's" anti-epidemic policy caused by the poor management of disinfectant.

articles.title: Earlier Decision on Motion Calling for Impeachment of Park Geun Hye Demanded
articles.content:
Earlier Decision on Motion Calling for Impeachment of Park Geun Hye Demanded
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The emergency measure council of the south Korean Council of Christian Churches urged the "constitutional court" to make an earlier decision on the motion calling for impeachment of Park Geun Hye, according to the south Korean CBS on Dec. 26.
					 The organization said the people suffered a lot and shed lots of tears due to the "president's" illegal acts and "poor state administration", urging the "constitutional court" to make a decision on the motion as demanded by the people.
					
					 If the decision is delayed, the people will be its victims, the organization said, expressing concern.
					
					 It urged the "constitutional court" to make an immediate decision so that the people's life can return to normal.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Spanish Party
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Spanish Party
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Democratic Workers' Party of Spain made public a statement on Dec. 17 in commemoration of the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Paying high tribute to Kim Jong Il on the fifth anniversary of his demise, the statement said:
					
					 In the wake of collapse of socialism in different countries, the imperialists escalated their anti-DPRK moves. However, the Korean people opened up an untrodden path for protecting socialism with confidence in sure victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Now the Korean people are making miracles and innovations every day in the drive for building a powerful socialist country, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We fully support their just cause. We will widely inform the Spanish people of the eye-opening successes being made in socialist Korea under the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Finland, Norway, Denmark, UK, Romania and Bulgaria between December 8 and 17 to commemorate the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Hanging on the front walls of the venues were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display in the venues were photos showing the exploits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the efforts of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Korean films "Kimjongilia" and "Flag of the Workers' Party of Korea" were watched at the film shows.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets at the portraits of the great leaders and paid high tribute to them.
					
					 The chairman of the Finnish Communists' League, the chairman of the Finland-Korea Society and the chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea noted with high appreciation that Kim Jong Il had strengthened the Korean People's Army into an invincible one equipped with nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway said the Korean people could tide over all the difficulties and lay a solid foundation for building a powerful socialist country thanks to the guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association said the demise of Kim Jong Il was a great loss to the Korean people and the world progressives, praising his marked exploits for the times and history.
					
					 The chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania said the DPRK turned into an invincible power under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The reporter and speakers at a remembrance meeting in Bulgaria said that the Korean people would surely emerge victorious in the struggle to protect the sovereignty of the country and build a powerful socialist country.
					
					 Messages to Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un of the DPRK were adopted at the events held in Finland, Norway, Denmark and UK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Life Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Life Praised Abroad
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Internet websites of different countries and international organizations posted special write-ups between Nov. 28 and Dec. 17 to commemorate the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany carried an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il, whole life for people" accompanied with a portrait of his smiling image.
					
					 The article said Kim Jong Il devoted his all to happiness of the people.
					
					 He passed away on a running train for field guidance for people, it noted, adding that his life was the one of love and devotion to the people.
					
					 The Korean Friendship Association carried such articles as "Eternal rays of the great idea of Comrade Kim Jong Il", "Comrade Kim Jong Il, eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea" and "Peerless patriot" together with the portrait of his smiling image and photos on his revolutionary activities.
					
					 The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and the Juche Idea Study Group of Basque Country of Spain posted on their websites articles praising the devoted life of Kim Jong Il for the people together with photos of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea in an article titled "Whole life for people" said that several decades of Kim Jong Il's leadership can be represented as epic of love and trust in the people.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Romania in an article "Great leader Kim Jong Il" lauded the undying exploits of Kim Jong Il who made great contributions to the era and history with his distinguished idea and theories and through his great revolutionary practices.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered at DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered at DPRK Missions Abroad
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Memorial meetings, seminars, lectures, round-table talks, photo and book exhibitions and film shows took place at DPRK missions in Russia, Vietnam, Laos, Iran, Cambodia, Mongolia, Thailand, India, Malaysia, Romania, Germany, France, Switzerland, UK, Spain, Italy, Poland, Senegal, Equatorial Guinea, Egypt, Nigeria, DR Congo, Peru and Brazil and at the DPRK permanent mission to the UN Office and international organizations in Geneva from Dec. 9 to 19 to commemorate the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed on the front walls of the venues were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and pictures of them standing together.
					
					 Also, on display were photos documenting the exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and works of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the struggle of the army and people in the DPRK.
					
					 Such Korean films were shown as "Kimjongilia", "The Sun of Songun Shedding Its Rays All over the World", "DPRK Tells with Bitter Tears" and "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity".
					
					 Present at the events on invitation were personages of governments, political parties, organizations and institutions and international and regional bodies in those countries and diplomatic envoys of different countries.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets at the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their pictures and paid high tribute to them.
					
					 The speakers stressed that the feats of Kim Jong Il would be always kept in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the world progressives, and expressed invariable support for the Korean people's just cause.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores y carta de felicitacion de Cuerpo Diplomatico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores y carta de felicitacion de Cuerpo Diplomatico
Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores y la carta de felicitacion que le dirigieran el Cuerpo Diplomatico en Corea con motivo del Ano Nuevo 106(2017) de la Era Juche.
					El jefe del cuerpo, Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, embajador palestino los traslado el dia 28 al canciller coreano Ri Yong Ho.
					
					Con anterioridad, el Maximo Dirigente recibio un cesto de flores y la carta de felicitacion que le dirigieran el embajador Sameh Lotfi Abdelhady y otros miembros de la embajada egipcia en Corea en ocasion del 5o aniversario del nombramiento del Maximo Dirigente como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ano Nuevo 106(2017) de la Era Juche.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de presidente palestino
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de presidente palestino
Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores que le dedicara el Presidente del Estado de Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas, con motivo del Ano Nuevo 106(2017) de la Era Juche.
					El embajador palestino en Corea, Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan lo entrego el dia 28 al canciller coreano Ri Yong Ho.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares en Corea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares en Corea
Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 5o aniversario de nombramiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, el Cuerpo de Agregados Militares en Corea le dedico un cesto de flores y carta de felicitaciones.
					Roman O. Jimenez Ortega, jefe del cuerpo y agregado militar cubano, los traslado hoy al general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia campana mezquina de Japon contra la RPDC y Chongryon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia campana mezquina de Japon contra la RPDC y Chongryon
Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Japon decidio dejar pendiente el pago de subsidios a 5 escuelas coreanas del departamento de Kanagawa por la razon de que ellas mantienen el contacto normal con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y sus manuales de historia no estan redactados como exigen las autoridades japonesas.
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo este miercoles un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					Si las autoridades japonesas tuvieran una pizca de conciencia, deberian asegurar a los estudiantes coreanos el derecho y condiciones de educacion nacional como gesto de remordimiento de sus errores del pasado y en vision de humanitarismo.
					
					Esto es la obligacion y responsabilidad estatal de Japon.
					
					Es muy absurdo que ellas cuestionen el contenido didactico de las escuelas coreanas operadas por la Chongryon.
					
					Ellas no cuestionan en nada la educacion de escuelas de otros paises y se obstinan en no subsidiar solo a las escuelas coreanas exigiendoles cambiar el contenido de ensenanza de la historia.
					
					Este hecho deviene la pauta de doble rasero y un acto de discriminacion nacional que parte del siniestro objetivo de separar a los coreanos residentes en Japon del regazo de la RPDC y de la Chongryon al imponerles grandes cargas financieras y causarles cambios psicologicos.
					
					Constituye ademas la peor violacion de DDHH y complot politico que pueden cometer solo los reaccionarios japoneses que tienen la hostilidad cronica a la Chongryon y la RPDC.
					
					Se aconseja a Japon que piense con seriedad en las consecuencias de la explosion de odio acumulado hacia el pais isla.
